name: survival shooter (leopardrunnergames)
description:
A retro survival shooter game made in phaser.

You are under attack from enemy spaceships, you must defend yourself from their oncoming attacks and avoid the asteroids. You have your main weapon and a secondary scatter bomb which is in limited supply.

The keys are as follows:

WAD or ARROW KEYS to move

Space to fire

S to use scatter bomb, secondary weapon

Press F1 to go fullscreen

Collect shield pickups to regenerate shield.
